name: FISH ATTACK!
description:
A poor UFO is trapped under the sea! Try to survive as long as possible!

This is a mini game made for Mini Jam 91: UFO. 

Controls: 

Directional keys or WSAD: Move the UFO.

Note:

This is my first time using Godot Engine. I had to edit a pre-made template to finish this project on time.

Since "Fish" needs to be the main mechanic,  having them as enemies is likely the easiest way to implement the mechanic.
